Young People's Learning Agency for England, which is responsible for college funding, to the Department for Education. Michael Gove , the education secretary, said he was abolishing the the School Support Staff Negotiating Body because it does not fit well with the government's priorities for greater deregulation. But the Association of School and College Leaders has said the move is "a retrograde step" and could lead to staff who "play an immensely important role in providing high-quality education" being underpaid.
